title: New: Nicolas Jaar & Theatre Roosevelt – The Ego
content: “The American people aren’t buying what he’s selling the people” – the opening line to Nicolas Jaar’s surprisingly upbeat, almost tropical new jam. I’d like to make it clear that there’s no way I would have spotted that if Pitchfork hadn’t noticed it earlier today, I guess there is a benefit to P4K premiering EVERYTHING first. Anyway, as it’s Black Friday it becomes a clear assault on the most odious day of the year. Away from that, we’re left with a vibrating, syncopated, synth-laden and ultimately fun little jam. Enjoy.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
